mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(username, password, salt, locked) values (#{username},#{password},#{salt},#{locked})
mapper.select: select id, username, password, salt, locked from sys_user where id = #{id}
select id, username, password, salt, locked from sys_user
select id, username, password, salt, locked from sys_user where username = #{username}
select id, username, password, salt, locked from sys_user where username like #{username}
